summary.span: 提供顯示少量動態內容的輕量型控制項。

span.span: Provides a lightweight control for displaying small amounts of flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以包含在字串及其屬性或非固定格式內容項目，例如， ，和，請在其屬性。A can contain a string in its property or flow content elements, such as , , and , in its property. 設計成具備輕量型的而且特別是在整合到非固定格式內容的小部分專[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。 is designed to be lightweight, and is geared specifically at integrating small portions of flow content into a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 最佳化以單行顯示，並且提供良好的效能最多幾行內容的顯示。 is optimized for single-line display, and provides good performance for displaying up to a few lines of content. 不適合案例需要顯示多個幾行內容。這類情況下，搭配適當的檢視控制項是較佳的選擇，比，在效能方面。 is not optimized for scenarios that need to display more than a few lines of content; for such scenarios, a coupled with an appropriate viewing control is a better choice than , in terms of performance. 之後，是下一個最亮加權控制項來顯示非固定格式內容，並且提供捲動內容區域，幾乎不需要[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。After , is the next lightest-weight control for displaying flow content, and simply provides a scrolling content area with minimal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 被最佳化的非固定格式內容 」 頁面-一次 」 檢視模式。 is optimized around "page-at-a-time" viewing mode for flow content. 最後，檢視動態內容支援豐富組功能，但是會跟著加重加權。Finally, supports the richest set functionality for viewing flow content, but is correspondingly heavier-weight. 水平對齊文字內透過屬性。Horizontally aligning text within a is done with the property. 對齊頁面配置中透過和屬性。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 元素。The following example shows how to use the element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimpleXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textblocksimplexaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： Textblock 和按鈕](~/add/media/textblock-simple.png "螢幕擷取畫面： Textblock 和按鈕")![Screenshot: TextBlocks and buttons](~/add/media/textblock-simple.png "Screenshot: TextBlocks and buttons") 下列範例會示範如何顯示如何達成類似結果以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to shows how to achieve similar results programmatically. summary.span: 取得或設定每一行文字與基準之間的位移量。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基準線是文字的虛數的水平列行中每個字元的基底文字的對齊。The baseline is the imaginary horizontal line with which the base of each character in a line of text is aligned. 這個相依性屬性也會有附加的屬性使用方式。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用`<`*物件* `="` *double*`".../>`，其中*物件*是物件內含項目 （通常資料流程項目） 。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* `="`*double*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a . 程式碼中，附加的屬性的使用方式會受到和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and .

summary.span: 取得或設定 的慣用最上層字型系列。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the .

value.span: 用於指定慣用字型系列的 物件，或具有一個或多個後援字型系列的主要慣用字型系列。

span.span: A object specifying the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.

value.span: 預設值是 值所決定的字型。

span.span: The default is the font determined by the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何子項目上的設定覆寫這個最上層的設定。Any settings on child elements override this top-level setting. 當指定多個系列時，第二個和後續的字型系列會做為後援，可在其中主要字型家族是無法使用或不適用的情況下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此屬性會指定只在喜好設定。This property specifies a preference only. 如果指定的字型家族沒有以無訊息模式會回復為所決定的字型值。If the specified font family is not available, the silently falls back to the font determined by the value. 這個相依性屬性也會有附加的屬性使用方式。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用`<`*物件* `="`*值*`".../>`，其中*物件*為物件項目（通常資料流程項目） 中包含，和*值*是其中一個字串格式值 XAML 值中所述。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* `="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 程式碼中，附加的屬性的使用方式會受到和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . 附加的屬性的使用方式並不常見，因為大部分的項目可以包含在支援，類似的附加`FontFamily`屬性，其中用於轉譯。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `FontFamily` property, which the uses for rendering. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動文字斷字功能可讓自動中斷並斷字，根據目前配置的條件。The automatic word hyphenation feature enables a to automatically break and hyphenate words, based on current layout conditions. 這可讓開始在同一行，再繼續此下一步，較長的文字，並通常會以達到更平均地分散對齊的文字中的空白字元。This enables long words to begin on one line and continue on this next, and tends to achieve a more even distribution of white space in justified text. 單字會中斷，根據標準的文法規則進行無連字號。Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以描述為所有方向統一 (`Padding="10"`)，或是為四個不同的值表示左，排名最前面，以滑鼠右鍵，然後下方填補獨立 (`Padding="5,0,10,20"`)。 can be described as uniform in all directions (`Padding="10"`), or as four distinct values that represent left, top, right, and bottom padding independently (`Padding="5,0,10,20"`). 如果指定的填補框線粗細超過相對應的內容區域維度 （例如，左和右邊框間距寬度的總和超過內容區域的寬度），填補的粗細等比例地縮減為不可以大於相關內容區域的維度。If a specified padding thickness exceeds the corresponding content area dimension (for example, the sum of the left and right padding widths exceeds the content area width), the thickness of the padding is proportionally reduced to be no greater than the relevant content area dimension. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是視覺裝飾，您可以加入文字。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 文字裝飾的四種類型： 底線、 基準、 刪除線和頂線。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 如需文字裝飾的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立文字裝飾](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). 根據預設，這個屬性設定為`null`且沒有與其相關聯。By default, this property is set to `null` and has no associated with it. 加入之前任何文字效果，請建立新並將它指派給這個屬性。Before adding any text effects, create a new and assign it to this property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_TextBlock_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textblock_textdecxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下圖顯示如何， ，和分別裝飾呈現。The following figures show how the , , and decorations render, respectively. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 預設文字基準影響](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準上文字的效果")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically.
